Hero.title: Find an estate that suits your lifestyle.

About.intro: For those seeking an exceptional estate and lifestyle,
About.highlight: there is no better choice than Valle de Uco International Realty.
About.mission: Backed by years of experience and with the mission to revolutionize the way of investing in estates in Mendoza, Rodrigo Juri, licensed real estate broker, makes a difference for his clients at every step of the way in Tupungato.

History.title: Our story
History.paragraph1: The only specialized network in Mendoza estates that interprets the new lifestyle of those seeking to invest and enjoy in Tupungato. Inspired by an innovative spirit and years of market experience, Rodrigo Juri, licensed real estate broker, leads a differential proposal focused on productive estates, recreational properties, and investment projects with high potential.
History.paragraph2: Beyond the mountain views, vineyards, and unique properties of the area, the goal is to offer you a tailored lifestyle: whether you're looking for an estate for an agricultural, tourism, wine-making project, a strategic investment, or simply a refuge surrounded by nature.
History.paragraph3: With a selection of estates for sale in Valle de Uco and other strategic areas of Mendoza, you can find, through Rodrigo Juri's advisory, the ideal property for your project or investment, no matter where in the world you are.

Contact.title: Connect with us
Contact.description: Our team of experts is ready to help you find the perfect estate or sell your estate at the best market price.

Footer.description: Specialists in premium estates and rural properties in Mendoza. Personalized advice to find your ideal investment in the heart of Valle de Uco.
Footer.copyright: Valle de Uco International Realty. All rights reserved.
